name: ffmpeg-streamer
description: Connect to your video source and stream it to your browser.

scripts.dist: npm run lint:fix && npm run dist:pkg && npm run dist:zip && npm run dist:tar
scripts.dist:zip: zip -j dist/ffmpeg-streamer-macos-x64.zip dist/ffmpeg-streamer-macos-x64 && zip -j dist/ffmpeg-streamer-win-x64.zip dist/ffmpeg-streamer-win-x64.exe && zip -j dist/ffmpeg-streamer-win-x86.zip dist/ffmpeg-streamer-win-x86.exe
scripts.dist:tar: tar -C dist -cvzf dist/ffmpeg-streamer-linux-x64.tar.gz ffmpeg-streamer-linux-x64 && tar -C dist -cvzf dist/ffmpeg-streamer-linux-x86.tar.gz ffmpeg-streamer-linux-x86
scripts.lint: standard --verbose app.js es6_public/*.es6 routes/*.js sockets/*.js lib/*.js
scripts.lint:fix: standard --fix app.js es6_public/*.es6 routes/*.js sockets/*.js lib/*.js

author: Kevin Godell <kevin.godell@gmail.com>
